channel.title: Updates from Nick
channel.description: PR style updates - I can't help it, I'm a communications major

item.title: Prismatic to IFTTT
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: A small script that converts their prismatic likes into RSS. Handy for things like IFTTT.

item.title: Ethernick.com updated
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: This site has been updated to be a complete and flexible experimental playground. Under the hood it's put together with bower, bootstrap, and various other libraries. Additionally I'm playing with a few jquery libraries & a bit of olde school XML.

item.title: SoundCloud Radio
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: I'm toying around with the soundcloud SDK and putting out there a currated listening experience. It's not "live" but it is handpicked. You'll hear the same songs as others who listen, only it's your own order. Mixing radio's high, medium, low rotation with indavidual order.
